title: The new game client consistently struggles with youtube
body: Whenever I have youtube open in a chrome browser the new game client consistently has trouble functioning during champ select and freezes very often. Can you fix this?

replies.body: So, if chrome is closed it works fine?  Chrome takes a lot of processing power, which could be causing some strain on your pc and client.  What happens if you swap to low-spec mode on the client?  It should be available in the client's settings.  Let me know!

just had another incident within 30 seconds ago where the game client counted down to zero for the game to start - then it freezes and says i left champ select so i lose lp for nothing

didn't even have any youtube tabs open and yes i was running on low spec mode, why does the league client keep crashing? it's been like this since i first started using it so i'm always going back to the legacy client where things worked properly

Thanks for the info.  There could be quite a few reasons causing it, like an unstable connection or if you have any third party programs running.  It sounds to me like your network is failing to transition from champion select to the game server and leaving you behind.  Meaning, this might not actually be an issue with your client, but how your network is holding on to our services.   To start off, go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and make sure your network isn't running into any walls.  Let me know if you have any questions!

can you tell me what the difference is between the old client and the new client in how it manages connections/champ select so that I know where to begin? that's a rather long list of things that could be wrong

They both use the same services, though some may be in different parts.  I know it's a long list, but it's really important to go through each step because they help rule out possibilities with local network issues.  To help along the way, though, you can download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  This will help with auto configuring your firewall settings.
